 7 Aql and 8 Aql are two Delta Scuti stars that had been under the STEPHI (Search for Variable Star in the Eyes of Hipparcos) observing campaign for many years.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Since 2003 we obtained multi-site observations of these stars in order to study their lightcurve variations in a more extensive way.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 New times of minimum and variabilities were found.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This new analysis suggests that 7 Aql is a new Delta Scuti variable and that its amplitude of lightcurve variations is lower than that of 7 Aql.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The observational data used in this analysis was obtained at different sites throughout the world using different telescopes and photometers, such as the 1.2m RCC Telescope of the Llano del Hato Observatory (Almería, Spain), the 0.6m TRASCA telescope at the Teide Observatory (Tenerife, Spain), the 1.5m STELLA robotic telescope at the European Southern Observatory (Chile), the 0.76m Plata 60m telescope at the Complejo Astronómico El Leoncito (Argentina), the 0.6m Fin humanitarian young scientist program (FHS) telescope at Haleakala (Hawaii, USA) and the 1.22m Mark VI telescope at Anderson Mesa Station (Arizona, USA).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The analysis of the times of minimum and the amplitudes of lightcurve variations shows that the observed lightcurves of both stars present a large fraction of variations with low amplitudes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This kind of variations can be produced by cool starspots, which can be related to the recent passage of these stars through the solar tachocline.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Homology theories, and more generally theories adapted to look for aspects of a topological space which are invariant under deformations, variation or contraction of parts of the space, has proven to be highly fruitful in the study of the fundamental groups of topological spaces.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Coarse cohomology, with its geometric interpretation of singular cohomology as Borel cohomology of the space with coefficients in the topologized constant sheaf, similarly provides another perspective on the latter which has proven useful in the study of higher homotopy groups.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 With this paper we show how these two theories, homology and cohomology, naturally fit into a single framework which unifies them under the same name and provides new related theories, (co)cyclic (co)homology.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 More precisely, we introduce (co)monads arising as a pair of adjoint functors between suitable categories of (co)representations of bialgebroids, each with its own property of preserving (co)limits.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This allows us to give a unified treatment for homology and cohomology theories.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 As an illustration of the power of this approach, we show that when specialized to cases which have already been studied in the existing literature, such as singular and Borel cohomology, we recover the corresponding theories introduced before.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Finally, we apply our methods to a number of cases for which no homology or cohomology theory had been defined before, namely (co)cyclic (co)homology for bialgebroids, including examples coming from (higher) algebraic $K$-theory.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We study the stability in longitudinally flowing flux tubes in the solar convection zone.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We consider the modes with infinitesimal disturbances that are parallel to the flow and show that they are unstable when the angular velocity of the tube axis is smaller than a certain critical value.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This is in contrast to the case of tube rotation comparable to the Alfvén velocity, for which there is no unstable modes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The instability, which we term the Axisymmetric Modes Instability (AMI), may explain why longlived vortical flows were observed only in the upper part of the convection zone.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also compute the critical angular velocity as a function of various parameters, in particular for modes localized in the tube or in the surrounding fluid.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, we show that for localized modes, the critical angular velocity depends only on the tube radius and not on the magnetic field strength.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Finally, we compare the instability properties in flux tubes with the properties of fingering plumes and calculate the corresponding effective Richardson and Peltier numbers.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We show that the instability of flux tubes is expected to develop at significantly smaller values of the Peltier number than that of plumes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We conclude that the instability should lead to the onset of vortical flows in the upper part of the convection zone and to the formation of fingers in the deep interior.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 From this work we present a method to model the three-point correlation function of cosmological large scale structure.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 By the three-point correlation function we mean the number of objects as a function of their separation, and the scale over which this separation was measured.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Our method was based on the coupling of a N-body simulation to a peak-bagging algorithm, and is able to capture the signal on both large and small scales.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We illustrate our method on real data from the WiggleZ Dark Energy Survey, and show that we are able to reproduce both the one- and two-halo terms of the correlation function.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We further apply our method to mock WiggleZ survey data, and show that we can place competitive constraints on the bias parameter of dark matter halos, especially on small scales, compared to other methods.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Finally, we discuss potential extensions to this method that will allow us to reduce the sampling error and increase the range of scales over which we may probe the three-point function, ultimately allowing us to map out the full non-linear three-point correlation function.

 Two spin-1/2 fermions can interfere quantum-mechanically, exhibiting coherent superposition of ‘wavetrains’ with zero mean wave vector, and resulting in an interference pattern with fringes of equal amplitude but opposite phase.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Such wavefunction-based interference phenomena have been used to characterize the properties of quantum systems, with two-particle interference allowing for enhanced sensitivity to Coulomb interactions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Here we report the interference pattern of two independent electrons in the vicinity of the so-called “Hohng singularity” in the joint electron density of two separate but co-located helium droplets.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The observed two-particle interference pattern is of excellent agreement with calculations based on the exact two-particle Schrödinger equation, allowing determination of the phase difference between interfering waves, and thus the interference fringes provide a precise measurement of the Aharonov-Bohm phase caused by the spatial overlap of the two separate electron wave functions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These studies on two-particle interference with helium – a deceptively simple system with complex many-body interactions – illustrate the power of this interference phenomenon to characterize quantum many-body systems and hold great potential for application to quantum technologies and simulation.

 The Dicke model is an exactly solvable model of quantum many-body physics, which describes a collection of N two-level systems, or qubits, all of which are in the same quantum state, interact with each other through dipole-dipole coupling, and are subject to an external driving field.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The model exhibits a quantum phase transition from a normal phase to a cooperative phase as the coupling strength exceeds a critical value.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 As an exactly solvable model, the Dicke model has been extensively studied and is well understood, but its extension to an N-qubit system with general multipolar interactions is significantly less well-understood.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, such general multipolar interactions were found to lead to rich quantum phases beyond the simple cooperative phase of the Dicke model, including a subradiant phase with non- vanishing expectation values of the excitation number operator and a Luttinger liquid phase with continuously varying correlation functions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Here, we present a method to characterize these phases, with an emphasis on the identification of the Luttinger liquid phase, based on the parafermionic quantum field theory of Abanov and Wiegmann.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We apply this method to a specific family of models with multi-dipole interactions and general dipole-dipole interactions, and find that the Luttinger liquid phase can be accurately captured by a low-level truncation of the parafermionic field theory, but the subradiant phase is not described correctly.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This example illustrates the utility of parafermionic field theory as a method to characterize phases beyond the cooperative phase of the Dicke model, and further investigation will reveal its broader applicability.

 In this paper, we propose a quantum repeater architecture capable of supporting long-distance, fault-tolerant quantum communication over broadband metropolitan networks.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 To accomplish this, we introduce a novel technique for combining low-dimensional entanglement and quantum fast forwards to scale computation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Our system design is optimized for several key metrics: entanglement generation rate, consumable resources, memory usage, and pair production rate.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The entanglement is generated between lightmatter qubits in a quantum frequency quadpter, distillation of the shared entanglement are accomplished in parallel on a cluster of nearby quantum computers, and a quantum signal reconstruction step is completed at a metropolitan node.

 Introduction Quantum repeaters use quantum entanglement to enable long-distance quantum communication.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Entanglement is a quantum property that permits two or more particles to have correlated properties, even when separated by a large distance.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Quantum repeaters use entangled quantum signals to distribute entanglement over long distances.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Since of the exponential decay rate of entanglement with distance, long-distance quantum communication requires repeaters that extend the entanglement over long distance.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Current approaches to quantum repeaters use individual systems, each optimized for a specific range of distances.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Systems optimized for short distances, such as quantum key distribution (QKD) systems, achieve high rates of entanglement generation through detection of either quantum side-channels or modification of qubits in transmission.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These systems optimized for long distances, such as quantum memories, achieve high rates of entanglement generation through purification of largelyentangled quantum systems.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Both systems require local adaptation of the transmission process, which limits the distances over which entanglement can become distributed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Within this paper, we present a quantum repeater architecture that combines features from these optimized systems for short and long distances.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The design was intended to support long-distance entanglement distribution over broadband metropolitan networks.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 It makes use of parallelization to scale the communication overhead from entanglement generation to quantum memory usage, and low-dimensional entanglement between light and matter qubits to achieve high rates of entanglement generation at low quantum resource consumption.

Rewrite the following paragraph:

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The QFQs are fully integrated on-chip networks that support multi-user connectivity and may be instantiated using silicon photonics.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These networks support entanglement distribution over long distances by enabling parallelization of purification protocols.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, the purification rates in previous approaches are limited by the need to localize the entanglement generation to specific purification registers.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this design, we propose a metropolitan node that combines long-distance entanglement distribution with fast forwards, a form of quantum communication that allow a quantum signal to become reconstructed despite loss.

 Introduction Realistic superconducting qubits like the transmon are an excellent platform for studying quantum many-body phenomena in nature.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, their highly tunable nature allows for an exquisite control of both system- and bath- dephasing processes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This exquisite control, however, had become an asset that now poses a challenge for sufficiently understanding and describing the underlying physical mechanisms.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this paper, we develop a detailed quantum electrodynamical (QED) description of interactions between realistic superconducting qubits and microwave radiation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The derivation is based on a high-fidelity derivation of the dispersive Jaynes-Cummings Hamiltonian in [1].

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For other derivations in the literature, our starting point is a fully calibrated transmon model, that is, a model with the complete experimental control settings encoded.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 By calibrating this model, we account for parasitic modes, an important consideration given the extreme small size of superconducting qubits.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A crucial result of this derivation is an effective low-energy Hamiltonian that includes the Jaynes-Cummings, Tavis-Cummings, and dipole couplings.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Using degenerate perturbation theory, we obtain analytical expressions of qubit-microwave coupling strengths and microwave frequency offsets relative to the qubit levels.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These analytical expressions facilitate a systematic understanding and controlled analysis for qubit-microwave interactions for any given experimental system setup.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The low-energy QED description enables a quantitative comparison of experiment and an assessment of control errors and residual non-QED interactions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Computing the exact dynamics of the full system would be intractable given the current level of complexity, but we can perform a numerical simulation of the low-energy QED Hamiltonian.

 Our results are in excellent agreement with both the measured resonant decay rates and the anlytical expression derived in the paper.

 In addition, our simulations explain the emergence of avoided level crossings in the system.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This explanation, which is not accounted for in the QED model, is a non-Markovian dressing of the qubit levels by the non-perturbative bath induced by spontaneous emission.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We finish this paper with a summary of the most important findings and a discussion of the potential use of this approach to describe qubit-microwave interactions in more complex settings.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Theory for superconductivity in a magnetic field: A local approximation approach.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The paper presents a general framework for building a superconducting theory in a magnetic field.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Such theory should be able to describe the superconductor below the critical temperature, as well as the magnetic materials with an Abrikosov vortices lattice at zero temperature.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The starting point of the theory is to assume that the order parameter is a complex field that depends on both space and time.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this way, all the degrees of freedom associated with the magnetic field were included into the theory and the coexistence of superconductor and magnetic flux states can be described.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 According to the complex nature of the order parameter, one needs to include many degrees of freedom to fully describe the superconducting state.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 To do so, one needs to resort to a many-body expansion of the free energy.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 With small coupling between the order parameter and the magnetic field, a local approximation is sufficient to capture the main physical mechanism.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This is done by treating the superconducting and magnetic materials on equal footings by introducing a new auxiliary field into the free energy functional.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The theory is applied to describe superconductivity in a magnetic field at the nanometer scale.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this regime, the London theory cannot be applied and a fully quantum mechanical treatment is required.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, it is shown that one can get a region in which a type II superconductor can sustain a magnetic field without any vortex lattice.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Their nature is still a matter for debate.

Rewrite the following paragraph:

Rewrite the following paragraph:

Rewrite the following paragraph:

 We argue that the origin of the five blue plumes with intermediate age might be attributed to the blue straggler evolution and the star formation in these galaxies might not be recent as previously thought.

 Within this paper, we report on the performances of the MEGAPIE target, which is a central design for the GS2040E case (2 MW net power output).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A substantial neutronics study is carried out for the first time for such a high temperature reactor configuration.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Results are also compared with the simulations made for the actual design.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Neutronic performances of the MEGAPIE target was found in good agreement with the actual design, with a DSA of 4.1% and a 3% level averagedteam pair space and momentum divergence.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In addition, results showed that the hydrogen control rod have a strong impact on the reactivity and neutron economy of the core.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The optimized configuration of the MEGAPIE target, called MEGAPIE+ is finally proposed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The MEGAPIE+ core configuration has been shown to perform close to the optimal one in terms of thermal efficiency, while improving the neutronics performances, thus leading to a significant reduction of the weight and the DSA.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The Bonn Lensing, Optical, and X-ray selected Galaxy Clusters (BLOX) is a sample of massive, X-ray emitting galaxy clusters constructed using data from X-ray, optical, and lensed Einstein ring surveys.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 BLOX clusters were detected in three steps.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 First, a HEC cluster finder identified groups and clusters in the Deep XMM-LSS (XMM-Newton Merged Serendipitous Survey) field.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Next, a red-sequence cluster finder identified high-redshift galaxy clusters in the HEC clusters' redshift slices.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Finally, a strong lensing cluster finder identified the most significant clusters from the red-sequence analysis.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The final BLOX cluster catalog consists of 823 clusters, out of which 752 are at z>0.1 and 91 are at z>0.18, covering a sky area of 1.34 steradians and containing 18,314 cluster members.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 By applying various tests for sample contamination and cluster finding biases, BLOX stands as one of the largest and most reliable cluster samples constructed to date.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The BLOX clusters' weak lensing mass and X-ray properties are presented in cosmological lensing papers associated with this release.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In the study of gamma-ray bursts (GRBs), it is well known that the log-log correlation between gamma-ray fluence and GRB duration has a break at the shortest duration seen from Swift, about 2 s. The correlation between the fluence in two different energy bands and the break time is also non-linear.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This has been explained by assuming that the observed energy bands sample different regions of the GRB relativistic jet, with higher energy bands sampling regions of faster-moving baryons.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A physical origin for this break time has been missing, until now.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 It was demonstrated that the break time in the observed correlation is the result of a competition between the variability time scales of the engine that powers the burst and the resolution time scale of the detectors.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The origin of this variability time scale is not a priori known, but is likely associated with internal gravity waves in the plasma outflow produced during the jet acceleration.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A physical origin for the break time is demonstrated to be impossible.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Thus, the previously-observed high-energy correlation between Swift GRBs no longer holds.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A complete catalog of Swift GRB spectral parameters was presented.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The catalog can be accessed online at https://observatory.gsfc.nasa.gov/ estimations/UXT11Y

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The dark energy, which is interpreted as a component of the universe with negative pressure, is one of the biggest mysteries in modern physics.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 One of the most promising ways of measuring its properties are based on the distance based cosmology called ‘Cosmic Distance duality relations’ (DDGR), which connect the angular diameter distance to the last scattering surface, dA, with the luminosity distance, dL, to the observed galaxy cluster.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 So far, these relations have been tested only on small cluster samples (e.g. Sunyaev-Zeldovich (SZ) effect, gravitational lensing) and with low accuracy (mainly due to the poor calibration of the local distance ladder).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 I present the results from X-ray observations of the largest, most relaxed galaxy clusters with the Chandra X-ray observatory.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These clusters follow the cosmic distance duality relation to an accuracy of ~8%, which is an improvement of a factor of 5 compared to earlier results.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The derived precise X-ray masses, which are used to test the cosmological models, are also presented.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The problem of counting colourings of the vertices of a graph, or equivalently, the problem of computing a count of the number of ways that a multinomial coefficient can be partitioned, has long been a problem of interest to combinatorists and probabilists.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A significant advance was the introduction of the dimer / coloring / bijection / Rosetta Stone (as first described by Kasteleyn and McCoy, 1966) by statistical physicists Ken Ono, Chetan Nachbagauer and Chris Janjic, which allowed for the development of a bijective framework for more general partitioning problems (Araujo, 1980, 1981; Temperley, 1971).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, even this framework was unable to count certain multinomial coefficient partitions (e.g. partitions by squares) without extensive case-by-case analysis.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In recent years, significant advances in computer algorithms have allowed for the study of these hard partitions via the Counting Principle (Dousse, Di Matteo, Rafieier and Cerf, 2013)

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 and these algorithms have resulted in the enumeration of some hard partitions (e.g. all 2-partitions of a partition into squares) without case-by-case analysis.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 With this paper, we carry out a systematic enumeration of 2-colourings of all facets of the cubic lattice (a total of 3779 facets).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find 20 distinct2-colourings, each arising from a different bijective framework.

 A population of Lyman alpha emitters (LAEs) at redshift ~ 4.5 was found to form over-densities by narrow-band Lyman alpha imaging, a sign of ongoing galaxy formation at early times.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Subsequent spectroscopy of these over-densities revealed lower redshifts (~ 4.5), though, for the most part, the LAEs are observed to remain at z ~ 4.5.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This apparent clustering was confirmed with numerical simulations and interpreted as evidence for the existence of substantial neutral hydrogen reserves in these early systems.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Itai M. R惠and Andrea G。Crocce led a team that used imaging of the UltraVio survey to find this clustering and confirmed it with subsequent spectroscopic observations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The study was published in the journal Science.

 UltraVio (University of Vienna Observatory), an imaging survey using the robotic 2.2m telescope of the University of Vienna, is described at http://www.ifs.org.ua/usno/auto/auto.htm.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The survey imaged eight square degrees in the sky with five passbands at 4000 and 9000 Å. The observations, from 2011 to 2016, are made with a wide-field camera designed by the University of Vienna and equipped with a InSb detector with a pixel size of 18 μm, covering a field of view of 1.76° × 1.76°.

 The survey is 95% complete to DM = 24.7.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The data are available at the University of Vienna Science Archive (URL: http://tagc.ifac.tuwien.ac.at/ultravio/).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Population III stars were the very first stars to form throughout the universe.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Due to their high inward flux of Lyman-Werner radiation, the HH2 reaction became rapidly inhibited, and subsequent H2 formation was suppressed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In a result, the lack of hydrogen caused these stars to become predominantly core-dominant, leading to the stellar dynamical collapse of the cores of these very first stars.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Magnetorotational collapse, as the name suggests, involves a combination of magnetic and rotational forces that aid the gravitational force in collapsing a population III star.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This process has never before be observed in such old, very first stars, and its implications for the early life of the universe are discussed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The very first stars to form in the universe, Population III, had no hydrogen due to the HH2 reaction becoming inhibited by the suppression of subsequent H2 formation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These first stars were extremely massive, with typical masses of a few hundred solar masses.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Population III stars, like our Sun, are initially dominated by their cores.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 After further contraction, radialGreg Anglin instability caused the formation of an iron core.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This led to a dynamical collapse of the core, which was ultimately triggered when iron nuclei reach absolute zero pressure.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 At this point, electronuclear reactions supported by neutronization become so rapid that the infall velocity of the rest of the star becomes super-elastic.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This results in a blast wave of nuclearfire, which completely encompasses the core.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The stellar dynamics of these events have never before be observed in such very first stars, and their implications for the early life of the universe are discussed.

 The author(s) obtained funds from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Seventh Framework Programme (FP/2007-2013)/ERC Grant Agreement no. 319581("PLConfig") and from the French National Research Agency (ANR) through the "Investissements d'Avenir" programme (ANR-15-IDEX-02).

 Y. Jin is currently a Ph.D. student in Prof. Geoffrey E. Strand and Prof. Junhua Wang's group at the University of New Mexico.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A detailed study of the suppression of cosmic ray flux above a sharp upper energy limit, known as the GZK cutoff, requires precise measurements of the altitude of the shower maximum, which is are achieved with surface detector arrays such as the Pierre Auger Observatory.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 From this work we present a new analysis technique based on the distribution of distances between consecutive surface detector elements, that allows the measurement of parameters that are more sensitive to the nature and the intensity of the primary particle than the traditional lateral distribution function.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We apply this method to characterize the suppression in cosmic ray flux above the so-called GZK energy and compare the results with previous measurements using traditional parameterizations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also study the sensitivity of changes in the content of primary cosmic rays and in the chemical composition by using a new parameter, the spectral rigidity, which is a measure of the energy separation between adjacent energy levels of a given atom or nucleus.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find that the behavior of the measured composition-sensitive parameters above the GZK cutoff is in agreement with the interpretation of this feature as a result of the interaction of high energy cosmic rays with the photon background, supporting the idea that the latter are composed mostly of atomic  4  and  nuclei.

 We performed a detailed study of the gamma-ray emission using data collected by the H.E.S.S.

 I and II telescopes.

The differential energy spectra of the two components and their integral fluxes are derived and the implications for the origin and physical properties of the gamma-ray emitting particles were discussed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Magnetism in the spiral galaxy NGC 6946 is investigated using high-resolution synchrotron radio continuum observations from the 64m telescope of the Max-Planck-Institute for Solar System Research (MPS).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In a short general introduction, we describe the observations and data reduction, present magnetic field strength and configuration measurements, and discuss the regularity and origin of the observed magnetic fields.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, the newly introduced depolarization ring technique is employed to detect the weak, highly disordered, large-scale magnetic fields, and the detected ring-like magnetic structures are analyzed with respect to their azimuthal symmetries and embedded energy transport processes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Additionally, we introduce methods to characterize the regular small-scale magnetic fields, i.e. the spiral structure, dynamo modes and helical fields, while deducing vector fields of regularized and unsharp masked total magnetic field maps.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We conclude by discussing consequences of the observed regular and random magnetic field configurations for the fueling and launching of the active galactic nucleus in the central region of the galaxy, and summarize the current research on NGC 6946 as a model galaxy for testing various aspects of interstellar and intergalactic magnetic field research using modern instrumentation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A semi-detached configuration is an hierarchical multiple system in which a star is orbiting a more massive companion (the white dwarf or subdwarf core) in a close, circularized orbit.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These systems are of particular interest in astrophysics, being among the lowest-mass binary stars.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 SS Leporis is an semi-detached binary system whose components are respectively a late-type (mainly K) star and a white dwarf.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Such a system is spatially resolved for the first time with the VLTI instrument VINCI at sub-mas resolution, and its integrated diameter has been measured for the first time.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The resulting value for the binary system is dSi=3.35±0.14 mas, corresponding to a projected physical separation of 2.65±0.13 × 10-4 solar radii.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The measured value is in very good agreement with theoretical predictions (2.94 solar radii).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Power-law distributions were were observed in a variety of empirical datasets, arising in a variety of contexts, such as the sizes of human settlements1, the masses of objects2, the income of individuals3, the stride lengths of individuals4, the cell diameters of plants5 or the bark widths of trees6.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The broad applicability of power-law distributions has led to the suggestion that such distributions may arise naturally as the outcome of a number of simple generative processes, such as the product of independent random numbers7, the catastrophic failure of a single component in a random failure system8 or phase transitions in discrete models9.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, it has also been suggested that power-law distributions may result from the superposition of a large number of more common distributions10, the simple permuation of a single common distribution11 or a logarithmic distribution12.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Indeed, there are a variety of processes capable of generating such distributions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For example, the superposition of a large number of common distributions can generate a distribution with a power-law tail13.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In addition, heavy-tailed distributions with similar mathematical forms to power laws have been observed in a variety of contexts, arising from different generative processes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For example, the late stages of a logarithmic distribution may be similar in appearance to a power law14, and it has been suggested that the size distribution of computer files may be consistent with a power law, even though this was often attributed to finite size effects15.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Similarly, one may speculate that certain types of networks may exhibit a power-law degree distribution, though this has not been demonstrated rigorously.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In addition, there are processes which generate power-law distributions which are not generative processes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For example, the removal of nodes from a network with a power-law degree distribution will result in the removal of nodes with degree distributions similar to a power law16.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 It has also been suggested that heavy-tailed distributions may arise as a result of the sum of a small number of more common distributions17.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For example, a truncated power law can arise as the result of a superposition of common distributions18.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this case, it is interesting to note that there are many examples of power-law distributions which arise as a result of a small number of generative processes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For example, the distribution of human settlement sizes appears to arise as the result of two generative processes - the growth of human populations through the coalescence of settlements and the natural variation in the size of settlements as dictated by geographical and environmental constraints19.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Using data from the INTErnational Gamma-Ray Astrophysics Laboratory (INTEGRAL), we have studied the gamma-ray emission from the Galactic Centre region.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The region is of interest due to its proximity and high concentration of massive black holes and pulsars.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We performed a detailed spatial and spectral analysis of the 18 months of public observations covering the region.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find significant emission arising in the central 6 parsec, with spatial structures and spectral variations on both long and short time-scales.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, we identify a newly discovered MeV gamma-ray halo surrounding the central core.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We investigate the possible origins of the emission, and find that both leptonic and hadronic processes are necessary to explain the data.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In the former scenario, we consider both broad-line and narrow-line regions, and find that a combination of simple one-zone models are insufficient to explain the data.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In the latter scenario, we consider the possibility of a population of fast transient sources.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find that a physical model in which distant supernova remnants collide with molecular clouds is consistent with the data, and require a dense wind of material from the central supermassive black hole to explain the gamma-ray halo.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We discuss the testable implications of this model, and suggest future gamma-ray observations which may distinguish between the two scenarios.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We study the topological and entanglement entropy of the toric code at finite temperature.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The topological entropy was shown to coincide with the exponential growth or decay of the number of different energy eigenstates in the finite temperature regime.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We characterize the topological entanglement entropy by considering a quantity proportional to the square of the mutual information, which we call the mutual information entanglement entropy (MIEE).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We show that this MIEE also exhibits an exponential decay in the finite temperature regime.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We evaluate the finite-size scaling of these topological and topological entanglement entropies using numerical exact diagonalization of small clusters.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These results are used to compute the entanglement entropy of a version of the toric code at finite temperature, for comparison with experiments in photonic lattices, that could realistically simulate the model with current technology.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We study the topological and entanglement entropy of the toric code at finite temperature.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The topological entropy is shown to coincide with the exponential growth or decay of the number of different energy eigenstates in the finite temperature regime.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We characterize the topological entanglement entropy by considering a quantity proportional to the square of the mutual information, which we call the mutual information entanglement entropy (MIEE).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We show that this MIEE also exhibits an exponential decay in the finite temperature regime.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We evaluate the finite-size scaling for these topological and topological entanglement entropies using numerical exact diagonalization of small clusters.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These results are used to compute the entanglement entropy of a version of the toric code at finite temperature, for comparison with experiments in photonic lattices, that could realistically simulate the model with current technology.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This work was primarily motivated by recent interest in the topological entropy of the toric code as a qubit noise threshold in quantum error correction.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We calculate the topological entropy via the Loschmidt overlap transform, which expresses the number of distinct eigenstates as an exponential growth or decay in the number of Riemann zeros.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We confirm the noise threshold by numerically evaluating the topological entropy of the toric code on small lattices.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also characterize the topological entropy as the mutual information entanglement entropy (MIEE), introduced to photonic lattice experiments recently.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The MIEE was defined via a quantity proportional to the square of the mutual information, and can be estimated via the Loschmidt overlap transform.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We numerically evaluate the finite-size scaling of topological entropy and MIEE for system sizes up to 15 x 15 with periodic boundary conditions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This calculation confirms that the topological entropy coincides with the exponential decay of the number of energy eigenstates in the finite temperature regime, and that the MIEE coincides with the exponential growth of this number.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also estimate the topological entropy and MIEE for the smallest non-trivial subsystem of the toric code on 15 x 15 lattices with open boundary conditions.

 A detailed kinetic study of the ring opening of cycloalkanes byCBS-QB3 calculations was presented.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The activation barriers for the chair, boat, and half-chair conformers of cyclohexane were predicted to be 22.4, 27.0, and 35.5 kcal mol-1, respectively.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The corresponding barriers for cycloheptane and cyclooctane were predicted to be 31.8 and 43.2 kcal mol-1.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These results are consistent with experiment and other CBS-QB3 calculations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The intrinsic barriers obtained for the chair conformer of norbornane and camphor were predicted to be 25.0 and 33.6 kcal mol-1, respectively, in good agreement with experiment.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The large difference between the intrinsic barriers of the chair and half-chair conformers of cycloalkanes is discussed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The zero-point energy and thermal corrections were found to have a significant effect on the barrier heights.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The rates for cyclohexane and norbornane at 200 degrees C were predicted to be 1.05 x 10-12 and 3.39 x 10-13 cm3 molecule-1 s-1, respectively, by using the modified Kamal equation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These rates are of good agreement with experiment and other CBS-QB3 calculations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The intrinsic barriers of cyclohexane and norbornane are predicted to be 36.0 and 39.1 kcal mol-1, respectively.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The former is consistent with the difference between the barriers of the chair and half-chair conformers, and the latter is consistent with the experimental intrinsic barrier of cyclohexane of 39.7 kcal mol-1.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Interstellar dust is a trace component of matter in galaxies, which are mostly concentrated in dusty regions such as spiral arms and nuclei.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 There are two contradictory views on the origin of interstellar dust: one is that the dust is formed in stellar atmospheres and ejected via stellar winds, supernovae or planetary nebulae; the other is that the dust is continuously produced in regions of recent star formation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 To solve this problem, a third model was proposed, according to which dust is formed in the intergalactic medium and is then brought into galaxies by collisions of large bodies, such as asteroids, comets, or dwarf galaxies.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This theory explains the observed correlation between the abundance of interstellar dust and star formation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The presence in dust affects the development of new generations of stars and galaxies, and their properties.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Interstellar dust comprises very small particles, typically a few hundred nanometers in size.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Optical observations in the visual and infrared regions are the most suitable for studying the distribution and dynamics of interstellar dust.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A promising tool for solving this problem is long-term monitoring of distant galaxies in the radio wavelength region.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The evolution of the spectral indices of the radiation intensity in radio wavelengths depends strongly on the distribution of dust in galaxies.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The analysis on the variation of the spectral index over a long period of time (several decades) makes it possible to determine the amount and distribution of interstellar dust in a galaxy.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The results from long-term observations on the dust content in a number of galaxies, made using the 100-m and the 45-m radio telescopes of the MPIfR in Effelsberg, the 1.2-meter and the 0.7-meter telescopes of the Special Astrophysical Observatory in Russia, the Westerbork Synthesis Radio Telescope, the APEX Telescope, the IRAM 30-m and the SEST 20-m radio telescopes in Chile, the Metsähovi Radio Observatory in Finland, and other facilities has shown that the production and evolution of dust in a galaxy is associated with certain properties of this galaxy.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 It was established that in late-type spiral galaxies the intensity of radiation in radio wavelengths increases with time, which indicates the gradual accumulation of dust in the intergalactic medium, due to the merger of large bodies.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In early-type spiral galaxies, the intensity of radiation remains almost unchanged, which indicates the small amount of dust produced in galaxies.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In elliptical galaxies, the level of radio emission decreases with time, which may indicate the removal of dust from these galaxies, due to strong and continuous influence of hot gas.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The Large Area Telescope (LAT) on the Gamma-ray Large Area Space Telescope (GLAST), when operating in the Diffuse Sciences mode, will study the isotropic gamma-ray emission of our Milky Way galaxy.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This emission results from the high-energy interactions of Galactic Cosmic Rays (GCRs) with the interstellar gas and radiation fields.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 An adequate modeling of this component was needed in order to accurately study gamma-ray sources in our galaxy and perform comparisons with models of the Galactic diffuse emission.

 In this work we present the development of a GCR simulation that will be used to build the Galactic diffuse emission model for the GLAST.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The simulation was developed using the GEANT4 toolkit, and includes a model for the gas and radiation field components, and for primary and secondary GCRs.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Neutral genetic drift, a form of genetic polymorphism occurring due to random genetic mutations, may aid protein sequence evolution.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Such a scenario can occur frequently during early protein evolution, when long protein sequences are less likely to contain strongly deleterious mutations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Under this model, while most new mutations are deleterious, some are weakly beneficial or even neutral.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These weakly beneficial mutations fix by chance in a population, because their slightly increased frequencies are due to genetic drift.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Due to their small effect, these weakly beneficial mutations do not contribute to an organism's Darwinian fitness.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, they contribute to protein sequence evolution, by helping compensate for the negative effect of strongly deleterious mutations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This "fine-tuning" through neutral drift can increase the organism's protein functionality and Darwinian fitness, even if its average fitness is still close to zero.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In contrast to previously proposed protein adaptation scenarios, this model explains how protein functionality can be maintained over long periods of time in the absence of positive Darwinian selection.

 The deuteron electrodisintegration threshold cross section is one in the main doorway to study the interaction between the electromagnetic and the nuclear field.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This process has been studied in the past at low and intermediate energies with various models and limited precision.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 During recent years the availability of powerful numerical methods to solve relativistic quantum mechanical problems allowed for the first time to perform calculations at higher energies, approaching the deuteron breakup threshold.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We present here a simple approach to the calculation of the process at relativistic energies based on a distorted wave Born approximation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The formalism was applied to study the process at a laboratory energy of 1.2 GeV, which is relevant for the creation of hot dense matter in current and future accelerator facilities.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find good agreement between previous results from optical models and the expected deviation from them at backward angles.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The GJC, proposed in 2001 by Luis Barreira, was a bold claim suggesting that generic topological chaos, a key feature of irregular dynamical systems, occurs in a large class of dynamical systems.

Rewrite the following paragraph:

 A real-time renormalization group (RT-RG) was applied to a quantum dot system in the Coulomb blockade regime.

Rewrite the following paragraph:

Rewrite the following paragraph:

 The late-M multiple system LHS 1070 is a benchmark in studies of stellar magnetism due to its strong and unique magnetic field.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We report the results of our discovery spectroscopy of this system with the WIYN 3.5-m telescope and subsequent Doppler imaging analysis of the components' stable and unusual abundance of elements other than hydrogen and helium.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find that its moderately fast rotator, LHS 1070 B, has a strong, stable magnetic field that dominates its atmosphere and slows its rotation at a rate consistent with rigid body rotation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In contrast, the even faster rotating components, LHS 1070 C and D, have much weaker magnetic fields and faster rotation rates than expected for their respective spectral types, consistent with previously reported magnetic braking acting on their surfaces.

Rewrite the following paragraph:

 We develop a polymer quantum mechanics (PQM) where the fundamental variables are continuous twists in a non-compact group, whose Lie algebra is an infinite-dimensional Hilbert space.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The Hilbert space of the quantum polymer is the space of sections of a vector bundle over the group with the standard fiber at the unit element, whose Lie algebra was identified with the abovementioned one.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The coordinate algebra of the polymer is completed with respect to a natural invariant trace.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This allows us to construct an invariant Schrödinger equation for the entire space of continuous twists.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The quantum polymer is also shown to be continuously deformable to the standard (commutative) quantum mechanics, where the polymer-like features appear as a self-similar fine structure in the spectra of some exactly solvable models.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also show that the polymer quantum mechanics can be approximated by a corresponding sequence of ordinary quantum mechanics for increasingly large degrees of polymerization, with errors vanishing in the limit.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The limit transition can be performed in two steps.

Rewrite the following paragraph:

Rewrite the following paragraph:

Rewrite the following paragraph:

 We discuss the implications of these results for the radius problem and the existence of planets around intermediate mass stars, and we show how these results were are used to test general relativity and determine the spin of companion stars.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Single-walled carbon nanotube forests with thicknesses up to a millimeter are grown by chemical vapor deposition using ferrocene and dioctylsulfoxide as catalyst and carbon source, respectively.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The forests exhibit a unique growth window that requires a high-temperature anneal prior to growth that results in oriented growth along the CVD-fed direction.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Simulations indicate that the growth window corresponds to nanotube forests containing only semiconducting nanotubes and the oriented growth is semiconducting nanotube segment alignment along the CVD-fed direction.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The observed millimeter-thick forests are of interest for several applications that require large-volume, high-concentration nanotube dispersions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We are currently exploring several methods of separating the forests from their growth substrate, including supercritical fluid separation, wet chemical treatment of the forests for dissolving the growth substrate, and direct solvent exfoliating the forests for regrowing on other growth substrates.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Astrophysical jets are very powerful, collimated outflows driven by compact objects, such as active galactic nuclei (AGN) and X-ray binaries.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 They are key in how galaxies and clusters obtain most of their energy and momentum.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The formation of astrophysical jets is still a mystery, but various theoretical models have become proposed.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In particular, it has become proposed that magnetic fields are important in generating, collimating, and sustaining astrophysical jets.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this paper we study the resonant coupling between the fast Kelvin-Helmholtz wave and the magnetosonic wave in a sheared, relativistic plasma, with special emphasis on the astrophysical systems in which this process can take place.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Our analysis is carried out in the framework of general relativity.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find that in these systems the resonant mechanism can efficiently channel energy from the shear into the fast Kelvin-Helmholtz wave.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For simplicity we consider a system consisting of a sheared plasma, moving with a Lorentz factor γ in a quasi-neutral plasma with an external magnetic field B0 along the y-direction.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We study the modes that are possible when the linear propagation speed of the magnetosonic wave is equal to the phase speed of the Kelvin-Helmholtz wave.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The most unstable mode has a short wavelength in the y-direction and a non-zero phase speed in the x- and z-directions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The growth rate in the most unstable mode is proportional to the square of the fluid vorticity in the y-direction, which means the instability is most efficient for differentially rotating systems.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, the most unstable mode also depends on the ratio of the shear to the sound speed, γShc, and increases with γShc, meaning that the stronger the shear, the more efficient the mode.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also study the stability in this most unstable mode against non-linear effects.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 When the amplitude of the magnetosonic wave becomes comparable to the amplitude of the Kelvin-Helmholtz wave, the two waves interact non-linearly and the most unstable mode evolves into a stable shock wave with smooth contact surfaces.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We conclude that the resonant coupling between Kelvin-Helmholtz and magnetosonic waves may have an important impact on astrophysical jets, which makes it an important area for future study.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The resonant coupling discussed here may also be important in microquasars, the envirnment of black hole systems like SS 433, where a pair of stars orbiting each other eject high-energy jets.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The stars are in nearly circular orbits, but the jets are highly relativistic and tend to ejection in a direction perpendicular to the orbital plane.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This parallelism between the orbital plane and the jets strongly suggests the extraction of energy and momentum from the orbital motion.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The extraction of energy and momentum from a shearing relativistic flow may provide a new mechanism for this parallelism.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The large scale structure (LSS) of galaxies contains powerful information on cosmological models and our understanding of galaxy formation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The Luminous Red Galaxy (LRG) sample of the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) has 27,000 galaxies at median redshift 0.38 and photo-z errors of 0.03 out to a redshift of 0.7, making it the largest contiguous high-redshift LSS sample to date.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We use this sample to measure the halo occupation distribution in a comprehensive suite of Monte Carlo simulations of six popular galaxy formation models.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The measured correlation functions are compared to the measured two-point correlation functions of the LRG sample.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The six model comparisons allow us to limit the sum of the virial temperatures of the dark matter halos hosting LRGs to be greater than or equal to 4.5 keV, and the sum of the stellar feedback heating rates to be less than or equal to 12.7 keV.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These limits correspond with typical WIMPs masses less than approximately 15 GeV for a standard thermal WIMPs model.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In high-energy heavy-ion collisions, particle production was strongly influenced by the path length dependence of the initial spatial anisotropyparticipating in the reaction.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Rapidity dependent Hanbury-Brown-Twiss (HBT) interferometry measurements can provide constraints on the spatial extent and the strength of the reaction initial pressure gradient.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Supported by an anisotropic flow calculation, two quantitative methods are proposed to determine the electric charge correlations in the phase space of the produced particles around mid-rapidity.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Applying these methods to the published Bose-Einstein correlations data obtained by the NA49 and the CERES collaborations at the SPS, the electric charge correlations were determined as a function of rapidity and energy.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 It was shown that at all energies and rapidities the strength of the charge correlations is maximal for like charges and decreases with the opposite charge correlations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The rapidity dependence of the correlations strength shows a minimum at about 3.2 times the pion chemical potential and increases at larger longitudinal distances from the mid-rapidity.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We describe Verlinde-like formulas for degenerate fields of logarithmic CFTs with central charge c_{p,1}.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We show that the degeneracies of these fields are in one-to-one correspondence with certain kinds of branched coverings of the Riemann sphere branched at three points.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The number of these coverings, which we call n-fold branched coverings, is given by an explicit formula in terms of residues of certain locally analytic functions on the complex plane.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also discuss a curious connection between the Gauss hypergeometric function, and its relation to branching points.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Our formulas generalize both existing Verlinde-like formulas in CFTs of central charge c_{p,p'} and formulas of Haglund, Hemmer, and Aulbach for degenerate fields in logarithmic CFTs with c_{p,1}.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We give two proofs of our formulas, one using ideas from the theory of Toda forms, and one using ideas from the theory of Gaussian hypergeometric functions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Type-II superconductors undergo a transition into a resistive state above the critical temperature Tc, the Meissner effect.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In conventional superconductors, the resistive state is understood as a lossless state known as the Vinen-WFlagsal state, named after the investigators who discovered it.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In a three-dimensional (3D) superconductor, twisted magnetic field configurations known as vortex lines move from regions of higher to lower temperature, thereby forming a Bose-Einstein condensate of bosons.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This phenomenon of supercooling was first observed in strongly type-II superconductors in a thin foil configuration.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Here we report the observation of a Bose-Einstein condensate of bosons in thin films of the strongly type-II superconductor niobium tin (Nb3Sn).

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Unlike thin foils, thin films are two-dimensional (2D), and so exhibit 2D supercooling at lower temperatures.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find that 2D supercooling is complete at approx.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 20 mK for our thinnest films, corresponding to a critical current approximately 500 times that of the Meissner state.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For lower temperatures we observe thermally activated behaviour, and fit an Arrhenius law to extract an activation energy of 25 μeV.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We show that this is consistent with the proposed energy gap of the strongly type-II superconductor niobium tin (Nb3Sn), and argue that the large observed critical current is consistent with 3D supercooling in our thin films.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Galactic globular clusters were generally identified from their high galactic latitude, low optical surface brightness, and redness in the color-magnitude diagram.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, a handful of globular clusters can also be found near the center of the Milky Way, within its historic luminous profile.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These “central” clusters are particularly interesting due to their past association with galactic nuclei and their present potential to become tagged as loci of ongoing nucleosynthesis.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Here we report on a study of the central cluster NGC 2419.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We have obtained spectra for over a hundred red giants, from which we have measured chemical compositions and mapped the cluster metallicity and spatial distribution.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We have uncovered a previously-unrecognized spatial structure in the distribution of calcium abundances that are correlated with that of the iron-peak elements.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These compositional structures are suggestive of multiple epochs of star formation in NGC 2419, with the iron-peak showing evidence of chemical enrichment from the most recent (and presumably, central) generation of stars.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 NGC 2419 is thus a most promising galactic nucleus-related cluster currently known.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The geomagnetic field is a vital indicator for space weather.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 It is composed of a predominantly dipolar component generated by the motion of inner core, and a fluctuating component generated by atmospheric and solar processes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The amplitude in the fluctuating component decreases rapidly with distance from the magnetic north and requires the integration of solar input and atmospheric response to accurately determine its amplitude and dipole moment at Earth’s surface.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The geomagnetic field can be observed directly via magnetometers, or inferred from satellite measurements of the geopotential and bulk plasma flow.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 While the state of the art in direct measurement technology has improved considerably over the past five decades, direct measurements are costly, subject to availability, and are unable to measure three dimensional field information at the Earth’s surface.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 For this reason, geophysical models have been coupled to magnetic field data assimilation in order to determine the 3D field amplitude and dipole moment at the surface.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This paper reviews some of the specific advances made in variational data assimilation, a recently developed technique for the assimilation of indirect observation data in order to improve the estimation of the state of a dynamical system.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The variational method is cast as a constrained optimization problem in the J-subproblem and D-subproblem, where J and D denote the Jacobian and Hessian matrices, respectively.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We demonstrate the effectiveness in the method through the assimilation of magnetic field data from a single location on Earth to a nonlinear, high-dimensional, and sparse MHD model.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The application to variational assimilation of the magnetic field is a promising new direction for improving the accuracy of geophysical models and, in the long term, improving our understanding of the dynamo process that generates the Earth’s magnetic field.

 A dust component 2 kpc above the plane in the Sombrero Galaxy (NGC 891) is discovered by NAOMI.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This component was composed of Olivet refractory silicates with a median size of 0.1 μm and a power-law size distribution.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Its peak wavelength(s) are approximately 10 μm, indicating the presence in very small grains.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This dust component was not associated with any observed stars, planetary systems, or molecular clouds.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Its origin remains a mystery.

 Asymmetrically charged surfaces experience a net force due to electrostatic interactions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This is commonly observed in nature in phenomena such as adhesion between two objects with different charges, or in the cell membrane and pollution sticks to clothes.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this work, the electrostatic interaction of a uniformly charged plate and an asymmetrically charged membrane is theoretically and experimentally studied.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The membrane has one uniformly charged surface and one non-uniformly charged surface.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 An exact expression for the interaction potential is derived for the limiting case of large plate-membrane distance compared to the thickness of the membrane.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The interaction potential is shown to be the sum of the interaction potentials of two uniformly charged plates.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The interaction potential is experimentally measured using neutron reflectometry.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The measured potential is of excellent agreement with the calculated potential.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The first three van der Waals coefficients were extracted from the measured potential and shown to have opposite sign to the sign of the surface charges, as expected from the long-range nature of the van der Waals forces.

 The Multiband Imaging Photometer at Spitzer (MIPS) is an infrared camera with capabilities similar to those of the Infrared Space Observatory but operating on the Spitzer Space Telescope.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This camera is used to make observations of several stellarforming galaxies at 70 μm.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Absolute calibration and characterization of the camera at 70 μm are presented.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The accuracy of the 70 μm transfer function was quantified by observing a set of photometric standards, and uncertainties are found to be 5.3% at 30 μm brightness, 6.1% at 45 μm, 7.7% at 60 μm, and 9.3% at 90 μm.

 Stellar color and temperature estimates were compared to those derived from Infrared Array Camera data, and the two datasets are shown to be in excellent agreement given the expected errors from both instruments.

 Next, the 70 μm PSF was characterized, with the measurements indicating that the half-power resolution is 14.3 μm, the full-width at half-maximum is 23.2 μm, and the average background surface brightness within the PSF is 1013.2 MJ/sr^2.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Absolute calibration is performed by observing Uranus at 70 μm and yields a flux of 357.8225 μJykpc2.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Additionally, observations of the outer regions of five galaxies at 70 μm confirm that the 70 μm emission is clearly extended, with surface brightnesses of 23.2 μm−2 less than that of the background at the 50% level.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Further analysis of these data indicates that the observed intensity is consistent with that of an exponential disk at 70 μm with scale lengths of ~4.2 kpc, smaller than but in good agreement with other wavelengths of observations.

 L- and T-type dwarfs are cool stars with lower masses than the Sun.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 They have significant quantities of deuterium, the nucleus of a deuteron, but no hydrogen, the nucleus of a prot hydride.

 Their spectra show the absorption bands of deuterium, as well as their own characteristic chemical bands.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Glutamate is the major excitatory neurotransmitter in the brain.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Its receptors, which are positive ionotropic glutamate receptors, are essential to normal brain development and function.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Most glutamate receptors are synthesized in the endoplasmic reticulum and then distributed to the cell surface via the Golgi complex.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This cycling between the cell surface and the Golgi complex is critical for their normal function, as the cell surface is the primary interface between the neuron and its environment, and receptors at the cell surface are readily poised to transmit a signal following stimulation by glutamate.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Here we report that cell surface glutamate receptors were continuously shuttled to and from the plasma membrane in a ligand-dependent manner using at least two pathways.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The first involves diffusion of a reservoir in the Golgi complex to the plasma membrane.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The second involves endocytosis followed with re- recycling to the plasma membrane.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Both routes are critically dependent on the GluA2 subunit of the AMPA receptor, which can provide a mechanism to regulate the number of glutamate receptors at the cell surface.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We also observed a similar cooperation between the two pathways in a mouse model of fragile X syndrome, and found that the drug 4-aminopyridine can activate both pathways, leading to increased levels of cell surface glutamate receptors and improved behavioral responses in the mouse model.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Our results suggest that increasing the number of plasma membrane receptors in the brain could enhance cognition and has potential as a therapeutic approach for neurological disorders caused by low levels of glutamate receptors.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Polymer simulations often involve the study of polymers in solution or a melt, where different aspects of polymer behavior is governed by the intermolecular interactions and environment.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A popular solvent model for such systems is dissipative particle dynamics (DPD), which combines simple mechanics with pairwise screened interaction between particles.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Because DPD exhibits different dynamic behavior than real polymers, it provides a computationally efficient method to study polymer systems.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Recently, the standard DPD thermostat has been extended to weakly couple the motion of particles to a external heat bath, producing the Langevin DPD (LDP) thermostat.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The LDP thermostat has been shown to provide improved thermostability and tunability for DPD, but its effectiveness for polymer simulations is unclear.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 In this work, we compare DPD and LDP for out-of-equilibrium simulations of a freely jointed chain in solution.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Simulations were performed for both equilibrium conformations and under stress, and compared to results from all-atom molecular dynamics with an implicit solvent.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 We find that LDP exhibits increased stability relative to DPD, particularly for the conformational distributions.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 However, LDP significantly reduces the sampling efficiency for the freely jointed chain, particularly for high persistence length and low temperature.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These differences is correlated to the momentum distributions, which are strongly correlated with the angular momentum alignment of the polymer.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Overall, these results demonstrate that LDP is a promising thermostat for DPD, but its effectiveness depends on the system and the variables of interest.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 A probabilistic cellular automaton (CA) simulating the evolution of a preys population coupled to a predator population was introduced and studied.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The system is composed of coupled maps, where the density of preys evolves according to a discrete stochastic iteration and the density of predators is governed by a continuous deterministic approximation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Each prey will randomly become predator at each time step with a given probability.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The population goes into two phases: a disordered one where the populations evolve toward a uniform distribution, and an ordered one where the system converges to a non-trivial spatio-temporal pattern.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 During the ordered phase, a travelling wave seems to appear propagating at a constant velocity.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 Its shape and the velocity of the wave can be accurately predicted by a self-consistent equation arising from a mean-field approximation of the probabilistic CA.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 The self-consistent equation displays two branches of solution: a stable one corresponding to the travelling wave, and an unstable one leading to an uniform distribution of the populations.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 These results highlight the ability of the proposed CA to capture both local and non-local interactions, and to reveal the impact of randomness on the pattern formation.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 This work is a contribution to the Theory of Everything initiative.

Rewrite the following paragraph:
 References: Bányai, E., & Thome, V. (2020).
